title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, an action triggers a beep sound.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' sound when I perform this action (the bell sound that usually indicates an incorrect action).
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Perform an action (e.g., typing, pressing a key, etc.) within the ControlExampleText.
4. Observe the beep sound being played.
